author: seungjin-yang
body:
#### PR description:
#30365 was about the GEM offline DQM. It created the problem in IB because #30365 uses GEMeMap::maxEtaPartition_, which is deleted by #30080. And then, #30440 reverts #30365.
To solve it, this PR reverts #30440 and then removes the usage of GEMeMap::etaPartition.

The following describes the added files.
- GEMOfflineMonitor checks the attributes of GEM-related objects like digi and rechit excluding what online DQM do. Segment part is planned to be updated after GEM/ME0 merging.
- GEMEfficiencyAnalyzer and GEMEfficiiencyHarvester measure GEM efficiency and resolution using both tight global muons and standalone muons.

@jshlee @watson-ij @szaleski
title: Re-add modules for GEM offline DQM
